DATABASE_URL.message: DATABASE_URL must be a valid PostgreSQL connection string with schema parameter

JWT_SECRET.message: JWT_SECRET must be at least 32 characters long

NODE_ENV.message: NODE_ENV must be one of: development, staging, production

AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY.message: AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY must be a 64-character alphanumeric string

AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT.message: AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT must be a valid Azure OpenAI endpoint URL

AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION.message: AZURE_OPENAI_API_VERSION must be in format YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD-preview

AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT.message: AZURE_OPENAI_DEPLOYMENT must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens

AWS_REGION.message: AWS_REGION must be a valid AWS region format (e.g., us-east-1)

FROM_EMAIL.message: FROM_EMAIL must be a valid email address

NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL.message: NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL must be a valid HTTPS URL

TOKEN_ENCRYPTION_KEY.message: TOKEN_ENCRYPTION_KEY must be a valid base64-encoded 32-byte key
